sentences: Vanaisa ütleb mulle sageli jutte oma noorusajudest.
Minu vanaisa elab väikeses külas lõunas.
Ta õpetas mind kuidas püüda kalu, nagu teevad paljud vanaisad.
context: The word 'vanaisa' refers to one's grandfather, specifically the father of one's father or mother. It is a common family term used in everyday conversation and carries an affectionate connotation when referring to elders.
